name: CASINO RUSH (Anaelle Mencias)
description:
Casino Rush is my own version of the 3D puzzle game "Rush" developed and edited by Two Tribes. It's a Unity project made in two months.

To complete a level, you have to guide the customer-cubes to their respective goals. For that, you have a fixed number of cards to put on the level that will impact the customer's behaviour when it touches it. The rest of the time, the customers will go forward and change their direction by 90° to the right if they touch a wall.
